he Chiefs Rest was a luxurious inn located in the city of Lheshayl on the Shining Plains.
As of the late-14 century DR, the Chiefs Rest was the most extensive inn in Lheshayl. Reportedly, it catered to wealthy travelers every desire.
At some point before the , Adamar Session, Bard of Starmantle, visited yhe Chiefs Rest inn during his twelve-year adventuring trek across the Reach. The establishment was advertised in the bards guide to the Vilhon Reach.
